title: A National Nightmare Last Night (Ep 1179)
description:
In this episode, I address the national nightmare emerging after the New Hampshire primary last night. I also address the latest turn of events in the Mike Flynn case.

News Picks:CNN couldn’t find a single Joe Biden supporter in New Hampshire. 

 

An unbelievable development in the Mike Flynn case. 

 

Here are the likely next steps in the Mike Flynn witch-hunt. 

 

The Justice Department finally steps in, in the Roger Stone case.

 

The Trump economy is far superior to the dreadful Obama economy, and the numbers don’t lie. 

 

The Trump White House has identified “Anonymous” and has severed ties.

 

A strange signal from space is discovered, and defies a simple explanation. 

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
